protein.general_function: Involved in protein serine/threonine kinase activity
protein.specific_function: May play a role in the response to environmental stress and cytokines. Appears to regulate transcription by phosphorylating EIF4E, thus increasing the affinity of this protein for the 7-methylguanosine-containing mRNA cap

reference.reference_text: Slentz-Kesler K, Moore JT, Lombard M, Zhang J, Hollingsworth R, Weiner MP: Identification of the human Mnk2 gene (MKNK2) through protein interaction with estrogen receptor beta. Genomics. 2000 Oct 1;69(1):63-71.
